item.description: I occasionally write on policy issues for mainstream media outlets. Some of them are listed here. Op-Eds/Technical Reports Funding India’s big green transition, Deccan Herald, 2025 On India’s export strategy, The Print, 2022 On PLIs and Indian manufacturing, The Indian Express, 2021 On Covid-19 and the threats to Indian economy, The Diplomat, 2021 On India’s FTA policy and its natural allies, The Print, 2020. On manufacturing and India’s RCEP inhibitions, The Print, 2019.

At Cal Poly, I teach the following courses: ECON 222: Macroeconomics ECON 312: Intermediate Microeconomics ECON 408: Mathematical Economics If you’d like to get in touch with respect to the slides/teaching material, please do write to me. I have taught and TA’d courses at undergraduate and graduate levels at Johns Hopkins. I list them here. Seminars in Financial Literacy, Intersession 2023 PhD level, General Equilibrium Theory, Fall 2022 Macroeconomic Thinking 1936-2020: Evolution or Devolution?
